org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class ale.Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.ale.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    ale

    @NoOffset
public static class ale.Settings
extends org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
    This class provides an interface for accessing frontend specific settings.

    Version:
    $Id: Settings.hxx,v 1.33 2007/07/27 13:49:16 stephena Exp $
    Author:
    Stephen Anthony

        public int getInt(@StdString
                  org.bytedeco.javacpp.BytePointer key,
                  @Cast(value="bool")
                  boolean strict)
        Get the value assigned to the specified key. If the key does not exist then -1 is returned.

        Parameters:
        key - The key of the setting to lookup
        Returns:
        The integer value of the setting
